casebody.data:
In the Matter of the Arbitration between Emma Ladin et al., as Executors of Morris Ladin, Deceased, et al., Appellants, and D. & C. Textile Corp., Formerly Known as D. & C. Binding and Trimming Co., Inc., Respondent. Submitted April 27, 1964; decided April 30, 1964.

No opinion found. Click here to view source material.
